event.description: Cesar Hernandez homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Howie Kendrick singles on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Odubel Herrera grounds into a double play, second baseman Jose Peraza to first baseman Joey Votto. Howie Kendrick out at 2nd.
Maikel Franco singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Michael Saunders doubles (1) on a sharp fly ball to center fielder Billy Hamilton. Maikel Franco scores.
Tommy Joseph strikes out swinging.
Cameron Rupp strikes out swinging.
Freddy Galvis homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Jeremy Hellickson strikes out swinging.
Cesar Hernandez flies out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Howie Kendrick singles on a ground ball to center fielder Billy Hamilton, deflected by pitcher Scott Feldman.
Odubel Herrera flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
With Maikel Franco batting, Howie Kendrick caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Tucker Barnhart to second baseman Jose Peraza.
Maikel Franco walks.
Michael Saunders flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Tommy Joseph strikes out swinging.
Cameron Rupp strikes out swinging.
Freddy Galvis pops out to shortstop Zack Cozart.
Jeremy Hellickson grounds out softly, third baseman Eugenio Suarez to first baseman Joey Votto.
Cesar Hernandez strikes out swinging.
Howie Kendrick doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Odubel Herrera walks.
Pitching Change: Barrett Astin replaces Scott Feldman, batting 9th.
Maikel Franco reaches on a fielding error by shortstop Zack Cozart. Howie Kendrick to 3rd. Odubel Herrera to 2nd.
Michael Saunders grounds out to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Blake Wood replaces Barrett Astin, batting 9th, replacing Patrick Kivlehan.
Tommy Joseph flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Cameron Rupp flies out to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Freddy Galvis doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Jeremy Hellickson triples (1) on a line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton. Freddy Galvis scores.
Cesar Hernandez grounds out to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Drew Storen replaces Blake Wood, batting 9th.
Howie Kendrick flies out to right fielder Scott Schebler.
Odubel Herrera doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Billy Hamilton.
Maikel Franco grounds out, shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Joey Votto.
Drew Storen intentionally walks Michael Saunders.
Tommy Joseph grounds out softly, third baseman Eugenio Suarez to first baseman Joey Votto.
Pitching Change: Michael Lorenzen replaces Drew Storen, batting 2nd, replacing second baseman Jose Peraza.
Scooter Gennett remains in the game as the second baseman.
Cameron Rupp grounds out sharply, second baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto.
Freddy Galvis strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brock Stassi replaces Edubray Ramos.
Brock Stassi walks.
With Cesar Hernandez batting, wild pitch by Michael Lorenzen, Brock Stassi to 2nd.
Cesar Hernandez lines out to left fielder Adam Duvall.
Defensive Substitution: Arismendy Alcantara replaces pitcher Michael Lorenzen, batting 2nd, playing third base.
Pitching Change: Raisel Iglesias replaces Michael Lorenzen, batting 5th, replacing third baseman Eugenio Suarez.
Howie Kendrick strikes out swinging.
Odubel Herrera walks.
Maikel Franco grounds into a double play, shortstop Zack Cozart to second baseman Scooter Gennett to first baseman Joey Votto. Odubel Herrera out at 2nd.
Billy Hamilton grounds out, second baseman Cesar Hernandez to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
Jose Peraza singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Joey Votto grounds into a double play, second baseman Cesar Hernandez to shortstop Freddy Galvis to first baseman Tommy Joseph. Jose Peraza out at 2nd.
Adam Duvall lines out to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
Eugenio Suarez grounds out, second baseman Cesar Hernandez to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
Scott Schebler grounds out to first baseman Tommy Joseph.
Zack Cozart singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
Tucker Barnhart singles on a line drive to left fielder Howie Kendrick. Zack Cozart to 2nd.
Scott Feldman hits a sacrifice bunt. Zack Cozart to 3rd. Tucker Barnhart to 2nd. Scott Feldman to 1st.
Billy Hamilton out on a sacrifice fly to right fielder Michael Saunders. Zack Cozart scores.
Jose Peraza grounds into a double play, shortstop Freddy Galvis to second baseman Cesar Hernandez to first baseman Tommy Joseph. Scott Feldman out at 2nd.
Joey Votto pops out to third baseman Maikel Franco in foul territory.
Adam Duvall singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Howie Kendrick.
Eugenio Suarez hit by pitch. Adam Duvall to 2nd.
Scott Schebler walks. Adam Duvall to 3rd. Eugenio Suarez to 2nd.
Zack Cozart flies out to left fielder Howie Kendrick.
Tucker Barnhart flies out to left fielder Howie Kendrick.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Patrick Kivlehan replaces Barrett Astin.
Patrick Kivlehan strikes out swinging.
Billy Hamilton bunt grounds out, catcher Cameron Rupp to second baseman Cesar Hernandez.
Jose Peraza singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Joey Votto flies out to center fielder Odubel Herrera.
Adam Duvall doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Odubel Herrera.

Scooter Gennett lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Tommy Joseph. Tucker Barnhart doubled off 1st.

Scott Schebler singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Saunders.
Zack Cozart strikes out swinging.

With Scooter Gennett batting, Scott Schebler advances to 2nd on defensive indifference.
Scooter Gennett homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Scott Schebler scores.
